body:
Thanks for looking over this everyone. I'm going to start implementing this today.

> Just one note that the "extra" field should be key/value even when recording.

Thanks for clarifying this. This is my intent. I am using a ES6-shorthand for object construction, in which `{ x, y }` is equivalent to `{ x: x, y: y }`.
body_text:
Thanks for looking over this everyone. I'm going to start implementing this today.

Just one note that the "extra" field should be key/value even when recording.

Thanks for clarifying this. This is my intent. I am using a ES6-shorthand for object construction, in which { x, y } is equivalent to { x: x, y: y }.
body_html:
Thanks for looking over this everyone. I'm going to start implementing this today.

Just one note that the "extra" field should be key/value even when recording.

Thanks for clarifying this. This is my intent. I am using a ES6-shorthand for object construction, in which { x, y } is equivalent to { x: x, y: y }.
